item.title: Preparing to do Deep Learning
item.description: This post’s about how to install TensorFlow, numpy, OpenCV and Jupyter to be prepared to run Deep Learning models in a local environment using either python 2.7 or python 3.6. Miniconda Miniconda is a package manager that allows creating virtual environments; this enables different python versions and libraries isolated from others. The next link points to the miniconda version for different O.S platforms https://conda.io/miniconda.html. The Mac OS X version it is used in this tutorial.
